```{r, echo=F, message=F, include=F}
devtools::load_all(".")
source('./man/code/plot.R')
source('./man/code/utils.R')
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  fig.path = "./man/figures/SternBrocotCurve-",
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE
)
remove_floating_point_mistakes <- function(errors, standard_deviation) {
  errors = errors[errors>=-standard_deviation]
  errors[errors<=standard_deviation]
}

bins=1001
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
standard_deviation = 1
path = paste0('./man/data/stern_brocot_',standard_deviation,'.rds')
fractions = readRDS(path)
errors = fractions$error
```

## Uniform

Variance: `r standard_deviation`

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
errors = remove_floating_point_mistakes(errors, standard_deviation)
print(plot_error_hist(errors,
                      bins=bins,
                      'fundamental', 
                      standard_deviation,
                      'Stern-Brocot Curve'))
cat("  \n")
```
Number of Samples: `r errors %>% length() %>% format(big.mark=',',scientific=F,trim=T)` \
Number of Bins: `r bins` \
